alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Holmes; Richland (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 10:20PM EDT until June 15 at 10:30PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN RICHLAND...SOUTH CENTRAL ASHLAND AND NORTHWESTERN HOLMES COUNTIES... At 1019 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Nashville to near Loudonville to near Bellville, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Loudonville, Bellville, Nashville, Butler and Perrysville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
